# betsol-ng-ui-router-styles changelog

## Version 0.2.1
(31 Mar 2016)

- Fixed an issue with missing function annotation


## Version 0.2.0
(27 Mar 2016)

- Events are now fired when stylesheets are started and finished to load


## Version 0.1.0
(04 Mar 2016)

- Styles are now loaded using resolve function


## Version 0.0.1
(04 Mar 2016)

- Initial release
